DOC.brief_title: Effect of Sildenafil on Endothelial Function
DOC.detailed_description: We are investigating the chronic effect of daily assumption of Viagra on the blood vessels function in patients with impotence. The study will include 2 groups: 1- patients with multiple risk factors, e.g. hypertension 2- patients with no cardiovascular risk factors
DOC.criteria: age 4070 impotence with and without hypertension, Hypercholesteremia or DM CHF: NYHA > II Stable angina: CCS > II Nitrate treatment
